name: react-hz
description: React Horizon makes it easier to use your React application with horizon.io realtime backend

scripts.start-example: NODE_ENV=development watchify ./example/src/index.js -o ./example/dist/js/bundle.js -g envify -t [ babelify --presets [ airbnb stage-1 ] ] -dv
scripts.build-example: NODE_ENV=production browserify ./example/src/index.js -o ./example/dist/js/bundle.js -g envify -t [ babelify --presets [ airbnb stage-1 ] ] -dv
